meanings.definition: The quality of being very attentive to and concerned about accuracy and detail.
meanings.sent1: Her fastidiousness in checking every detail of the report ensured its accuracy.
meanings.sent2: His fastidiousness in arranging the flowers made the bouquet look perfect.
meanings.sent3: The fastidiousness of the chef in plating the dish made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The fastidiousness of the detective in examining the evidence solved the case quickly.
meanings.sent5: The fastidiousness of the tailor in sewing each stitch precisely resulted in a flawless dress.

meanings.definition: The trait of being excessively particular, critical, or demanding.
meanings.sent1: His fastidiousness when it comes to cleanliness makes him clean his room multiple times a day.
meanings.sent2: The fastidiousness of the teacher in grading papers sometimes delays returning them to the students.
meanings.sent3: Her fastidiousness in choosing the perfect gift for her friend often leads to indecision.
meanings.sent4: The fastidiousness of the editor in checking every word ensures the article is error-free.
meanings.sent5: The fastidiousness of the architect in designing the building resulted in a masterpiece of precision.
